'''Caspar''' is an open-world [[NPC]] in [[Liyue]] who originally came from [[Fontaine]]. He can be found near the [[Wangshu Inn]], admiring the scenery.

==Idle Quotes==
{{Dialogue Start}}
: {{DIcon|Idle}} Look at that sky...
:: {{A|VO Caspar 01.ogg}} "Look at that sky. Now that is why I came to Liyue."
{{Dialogue End}}

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Caspar:''' ...
:'''Caspar:''' Oh, hello there! I was a little too absorbed with the scenery.
:{{DIcon}} What about it?
::'''Caspar:''' It is truly magnificent. Completely different from my homeland, Fontaine!
::'''Caspar:''' I passed by [[Qingyun Peak]] on my way here. Its profile was almost completely obscured by the heavy fog, and it really was a sight to behold.
::'''Caspar:''' This scenery really makes one want to compose a verse or two, just like the poets of Liyue!
::'''Caspar:''' Look upon the mountains, magnificent as the... Wait, what should I compare them to?
::'''Caspar:''' Never mind. This mountain is just magnificient!
:{{DIcon}} Well, I shan't bother you further.
::'''Caspar:''' Farewell! How I wish that I could see such sights in my homeland!
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
* Caspar is a reference to German Romanticist painter {{w|Caspar David Friedrich}} who was known for his landscape paintings, his most famous painting being "Wanderer above the Sea of Fog." During a Lantern Rite Event Quest he sits together with [[Holderlin]], who is in turn a reference to German Romanticist philosopher {{w|Friedrich Hölderlin}}.
